title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Not everyone is brave enough to follow their heart. But when all things are equal, and maybe even when they are lopsided, it makes sense to choose the option that most appeals to you. If anyone calls you a rebel today, it is bound to be a compliment tinged with admiration. Allow your personal preferences to run the show and when the time is right, they can lead you to terrain that is rich with new possibilities. Rumi wrote, Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
